message: Midorijima General Hospital.
They've made improvements. It's a lot nicer than I remember.
...Sei is here. The thought quickens my steps.
I pause for a moment in front of the entrance. My Coil is beeping.
Another game. It's been ages since the last one.
Those games were messages from Sei. Could it be...?

name: 蒼葉
message: "A present? ...I don't get it, but I guess it's something good?"
I don't know if it was from Sei like the others.
But...

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's only one person who could do this..."
...Resolute, I head into the hospital.
The lobby is big and full of people waiting on couches. I walk up to the reception desk and give Sei's name.
Once I have the room number―403―I board the elevator.
I get off on the fourth floor and stop by the nurses' station.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Excuse me."
A nurse comes over.

name: 看護士
message: "Are you here for the patient in room 403?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes."

name: 看護士
message: "Right this way, please."
I follow the nurse down the hall.
The immaculate white of the walls brings back unpleasant memories.
But the sight of Room 403 wipes them all away.

name: 看護士
message: "He's right in here."

name: 看護士
message: "His bandages come off today. The doctor signed off on it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, okay."

name: 看護士
message: "You're Sei's brother, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 看護士
message: "I think he'll be delighted. ...Sei? You have a visitor."
